name: Organized Mascot
description:
The Organized Mascot Tee - made from 100% cotton!

All designs are printed with high quality screen printing that will outlast the garment. On the front you will find the an over-sized screen print of the Lazy Clothing Mascot "Organized", on the back is a Lazy dot logo printed for extra style. Inside the neck collar is the official Lazy Clothing Tag with wash instructions.

Sizes range from Medium - XXLarge [while supplies last]

name: Lazy Lay-ups
description:
Lazy Lay-up Tee - made from 100% cotton that fits like a fresh pair of new shoes!

All designs are printed with high quality screen printing that will outlast the garment. On the front you will find the an over-sized screen print B-Ball Logo, on the back is a Lazy dot logo printed for extra style. Inside the neck collar is the official Lazy Clothing Tag with wash instructions.

Sizes range from Medium - XXLarge [while supplies last]

name: Knocked Out!!!
description:
Knocked Out!!! Tee - made from 100% cotton that fits like a boxing glove!

All designs are printed with high quality screen printing that will outlast the garment. On the front you will find the an over-sized screen print of a former World Champion, on the back is a Lazy logo printed for extra style.  Inside the neck collar is the official Lazy Clothing Tag with wash instructions.

Sizes range from Medium - XXLarge [while supplies last]
